content: If you don't need this group anymore

comment.text: This translation key is used for the description of a delete group option in an empty screen, informing users that they can remove the group if needed. It appears as part of a dialog button and is intended to provide context for deleting a group.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Artıq bu qrupa ehtiyacınız yoxdursa' is a bit too formal for a user interface element. A more natural phrasing would be closer to 'If you no longer need this group'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Əgər artıq bu qrupa ehtiyacınız yoxdursa

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Si ya no necesita este grupo' uses the formal 'necesita' (you need). It's more natural and user-friendly to use the informal 'Si ya no lo necesitas' or 'Si ya no lo quieres'.

The translation 'このグループを必要としなくなった場合' is technically correct but a bit formal and verbose for the context of a user interface. It translates to 'If you no longer need this group'. A more natural and concise phrasing would be better suited.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: このグループが不要になった場合

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'ඔබට මේ සමූහය තවදුරටත් අවශ්‍ය නොවනවා නම්' is a bit literal and verbose. A more natural-sounding translation would be closer to 'If you no longer need this group'.

The English phrase 'If you don't need this group anymore' implies a singular 'you' addressing the user. The Slovenian translation 'Če te skupine ne potrebujete več' uses the plural 'you' (potrebujete). This changes the intended meaning and creates a less personal feel.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Če te skupine ne potrebujete več (formal/plural) OR Če te skupine ne potrebuješ več (informal/singular)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Ако вам ова група више није потребна' is a literal translation but sounds slightly unnatural in Serbian. A more natural phrasing would be closer to 'Ако група више није потребна' or 'Ако вам група није више потребна'.
